explains: adv. 系统地；合乎科学地；学问上

sentences.en: Efforts are being made to research it scientifically.
sentences.cn: 正在努力对它进行科学研究。

sentences.en: The parts of the enterprise which are scientifically the most exciting are unlikely to be militarily useful. I am thinking here of the development of new kinds of lasers.
sentences.cn: 这份计划中，从科学角度看最让人兴奋的部分在军事上却可能无用。我指的是新型激光开发。

sentences.en: Please tell people how to deal with the rubbish scientifically.
sentences.cn: 请告诉人们如何科学地处理垃圾。
